content: Darius, love it. I just had a very similar conversation with my alma mater that the published the other day: It’s like the marshmallow theory; you sit a kid at a table with one marshmallow, and tell them that if it’s still there when you return, they can have two marshmallows. If the kid eats the marshmallow, they should just get a job. We want to teach aspiring entrepreneurs not to eat the marshmallow.
